name: (Jamoween) EndSong Game Concept
description:
This is a game concept of a turn-based RPG

Controls:

WASD / Arrowkeys - correspond direction on action wheel

Only Attack (the sword) works 100% in the battle scene

Heal (the potion) works partially, but it's lacking some effects.

No health is shown on purpose, although I was planning for visual cues on character statuses.

The game concept is obviously very work in progress. It's a rock-paper-scissors kind of game.
